parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: If the ETag specified in the request matches the ETag value of the object, the object and 200 OK are returned. Otherwise, 412 Precondition Failed is returned.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Account-Id
parameters.description: The ID of your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Date
parameters.description: The time when the function is invoked. The value is in the **EEE,d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT** format.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Trace-Id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the trace.

parameters.name: qualifier
parameters.description: The service alias or latest version. Other versions are not supported.
